name: Skyline Penthouse
shortDesc: Glass-walled 35th-floor penthouse with Burj Khalifa view.
longDesc: Experience luxury at its finest in this stunning penthouse featuring floor-to-ceiling windows, premium Italian marble, and an infinity pool overlooking the Dubai skyline. The master suite includes a private balcony and spa-like bathroom with gold-plated fixtures.

name: Marina Vista
shortDesc: Waterfront luxury with yacht access and panoramic marina views.
longDesc: Sophisticated marina-front apartment with private yacht berth access. Features contemporary Italian design, premium appliances, and stunning water views from every room. The apartment includes a private balcony perfect for sunset dining.

name: Arabian Palace Suite
shortDesc: Opulent suite with traditional Arabian luxury and modern amenities.
longDesc: Immerse yourself in Arabian elegance with hand-crafted furnishings, gold leaf details, and marble from Italian quarries. This palatial suite features a private majlis, traditional courtyard, and views of the iconic Burj Al Arab.

name: Palm Beachfront Villa
shortDesc: Exclusive beachfront villa with private beach and infinity pool.
longDesc: Ultimate privacy and luxury on Palm Jumeirah's crescent. This villa offers direct beach access, private infinity pool, cinema room, and wine cellar. Perfect for exclusive gatherings with unparalleled service and amenities.

name: Corporate Tower Suite
shortDesc: Modern executive apartment in the heart of Dubai's business district.
longDesc: Sleek and sophisticated apartment designed for the modern executive. Features smart home technology, premium German appliances, and panoramic city views. Located minutes from Dubai's financial center with executive services.

name: Creek Harbour Oasis
shortDesc: Serene waterfront apartment with Dubai Creek views and premium amenities.
longDesc: Tranquil luxury overlooking Dubai Creek with traditional dhow views. This apartment combines modern comfort with cultural charm, featuring artisan-crafted details and serene water views perfect for relaxation.

name: Hills Garden Villa
shortDesc: Family-friendly luxury villa with golf course views and private garden.
longDesc: Spacious family villa surrounded by championship golf courses and lush landscapes. Features private garden, family room, kids' play area, and golf cart access. Perfect for families seeking luxury and recreation.

name: JBR Beach Apartment
shortDesc: Beachfront apartment with direct beach access and vibrant nightlife nearby.
longDesc: Prime beachfront location with direct access to JBR Beach and The Walk. This apartment offers stunning sea views, modern amenities, and proximity to Dubai's best dining and entertainment venues.
